title: Evaporating Truths

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: Insights that feel true even when they evaporate with the sunrise.
dialogue.context: At path's end with sun on horizon, describing the ephemeral truths of altered states

scene_context: The path ends with the sun on the horizon, as the Architect reflects on how altered state insights can feel profound yet prove fleeting.
philosophical_theme: The paradox of temporary truths and their lasting impact
visual_elements: Path terminating at horizon with setting/rising sun
